source.sqlReaderQuery: select hw_date from dbo.HighWaterMark_Table where tablename ='Customer'

activities.name: Get Latest Date from Customer table in DB

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(modifieddate) as LastUpdatedDate from saleslt.customer

dependsOn.activity: Get Latest Date from Customer table in DB

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.Customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('Get HighwaterMark date').output.firstRow.hw_date}' and modifieddate <= '@{activity('Get Latest Date from Customer table in DB').output.firstRow.LastUpdatedDate}'
select 'Customer' as tablename,'@{activity('Get Latest Date from Customer table in DB').output.firstRow.LastUpdatedDate}' as hw_date

source.sqlReaderQuery: Select count (*) as Totalcount from saleslt.customer

sink.preCopyScript:
IF EXISTS (select 1 from Information_schema.Tables where TABLE_NAME ='customer_copy')
Begin
Truncate table saleslt.customer_copy
End

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as Totalcount from saleslt.customer

items.value: @createArray('select * from saleslt.product where productid > 100','select * from saleslt.customer where customerid < 1000')

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as Totalcount from saleslt.product
Select max(ModifiedDate) as LastUpdatedTime from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('Get HighWaterMark date').output.firstRow.Prop_0}'
                                and  modifieddate <= '@{activity('Last updated datetime from DB').output.firstRow.LastUpdatedTime}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select c.FirstName,c.MiddleName,c.LastName,caddress.Addresstype,caddress.Addressid
 from [SalesLT].[Customer] as c inner join [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] as caddress 
 on c.CustomerID = caddress.CustomerID
select count(*) as Totalcount from saleslt.product
select count(*) as Totalcount from saleslt.Address
select count(*) as Totalcount from saleslt.product
select count(*) as Totalcount from saleslt.customer
